topic.title: WebHelp Responsive Layout Reusable Content
topic.shortdesc: Reusable content for WebHelp Responsive Layout and Features chapter.

dlentry.dd: The title of the publication. It is usually taken from the DITA map title.

dd.p: Displays a logo associated with the publication. Additionally you can set a target URL that will be opened when you click on the logo image.

The logo image can be specified using the
transformation parameter. For the target URL, use the parameter.

dlentry.dd: Helps you to navigate to your documentation. This component presents a set of links to all topics from your publication. For information about customizing the menu, see topic.
Input text field allowing you to easily enter your search queries.
A print icon that opens the print dialog box for your particular browser.
Presents a link to the index terms page. You can control if this component is displayed by using the parameter.
